sense.gloss: qi (in traditional Chinese philosophy and medicine), chi, ki
feeling, sensation, mood, state of mind
atmosphere, mood, ambience, ambiance, aura, feel
a certain air, presence, special aura, something (about someone)
lively, full of spirit, energetic, vigorous, vital, spirited
healthy, well, fit, in good health
illness (usu. excluding minor ailments, e.g. common cold), disease, sickness
bad habit, bad behaviour, weakness, failing
crazy, insane, disturbed, sick in the head
someone with no presence, someone who doesn't stand out at all
business conditions, the market, economic activity, economic climate
in one go, in one gulp, in one breath, without stopping, without pausing, without a rest, in one sitting, at a stretch
suddenly, all of a sudden, all at once
courage, bravery, valour, valor, nerve, boldness
will (to do something), drive, motivation, enthusiasm, eagerness
cool, calm, composed, unconcerned, nonchalant, unmoved, indifferent
to notice, to realize, to realise, to become aware (of), to perceive, to sense, to suspect
to regain consciousness, to come to (one's senses), to come round
infidelity, wantonness, unfaithfulness, inconstancy, fickleness, caprice

kiai, short shout when performing an attacking move
to notice, to realize, to realise, to become aware (of), to perceive, to sense, to suspect
to be attentive, to be scrupulous, to be observant
to regain consciousness, to come to (one's senses), to come round

seeming, giving the appearance of, giving one the feeling of

feeling ill, sensation of illness, signs of illness

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑人↑↓ひと↓は、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓ったようだ。
sdata.e: The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.

sdata.j: ↑大抵↑↓たいてい↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓っている。
sdata.e: Most people think I'm crazy.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はなぜか↑夜↑↓よる↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓が↑元気↑↓げんき↓だ。
sdata.e: For some reason I feel more alive at night.

sdata.j: それで↑彼↑↓かれ↓らの↑気↑↓き↓が↑変↑↓か↓わったのかも↑知↑↓し↓れない。
sdata.e: That was probably what influenced their decision.

sdata.j: ↑歌詞↑↓かし↓を↑見↑↓み↓てみれば、あまり↑意味↑↓いみ↓が↑無↑↓な↓いことに↑気付↑↓きづ↓くでしょう。
sdata.e: If you look at the lyrics, they don't really mean much.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑気付↑↓きづ↓いていない↑問題↑↓もんだい↓がある。
sdata.e: There's a problem there that you don't see.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑物理↑↓ぶつり↓の↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓をサボっても↑気↑↓き↓にしない。
sdata.e: My physics teacher doesn't care if I skip classes.

sdata.j: その↑後↑↓ご↓↑私↑↓わたし↓はそこを↑出↑↓で↓るんだけど、↑鞄↑↓かばん↓を↑忘↑↓わす↓れてきたことに↑気付↑↓きづ↓くんだ。
sdata.e: After that, I left, but then I realized that I forgot my backpack at their house.

sdata.j: なぜみんなが↑私↑↓わたし↓のことを↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓うのか、↑遂↑↓つい↓に↑説明↑↓せつめい↓してくれてありがとう。
sdata.e: Thanks for having explained to me at last why people take me for an idiot.

sdata.j: ↑止↑↓と↓めて！あなたは↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑気分↑↓きぶん↓を↑害↑↓がい↓してるわ。
sdata.e: Stop it! You're making her feel uncomfortable!

sdata.j: もっと↑成績↑↓せいせき↓を↑気↑↓き↓にかけられればいいのだけれど、でも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑人生↑↓じんせい↓のある↑点↑↓てん↓において↑成績↑↓せいせき↓はそんなに↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓ではないと↑分↑↓わ↓かったんだ。
sdata.e: I wish I could care more about my grades but it seems that, at a certain point of my life, I decided they wouldn't be so important anymore.

sdata.j: 「↑気分↑↓きぶん↓はどうですか」と↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑尋↑↓たず↓ねた。
sdata.e: How do you feel? he inquired.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はとても↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓い↓りました。
sdata.e: I like it very much.

sdata.j: とても↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓い↓ってます。
sdata.e: I like it very much.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はすごく↑色気↑↓いろけ↓がある。
sdata.e: He's very sexy.

sdata.j: とにかく↑誰↑↓だれ↓かをぶたないと↑気↑↓き↓が↑済↑↓す↓まない。
sdata.e: I really need to hit somebody.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑元気↑↓げんき↓にさせるのに↑何↑↓なに↓と↑言↑↓い↓っていいか↑分↑↓わ↓からないよ。
sdata.e: I don't know what to say to make you feel better.

sdata.j: ↑元気↑↓げんき↓？↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓は↑良↑↓よ↓かった？
sdata.e: How are you? Did you have a good trip?

sdata.j: ↑気分↑↓きぶん↓がよくないんだ。
sdata.e: I don't feel well.

sdata.j: やる↑気↑↓き↓があれば↑方法↑↓ほうほう↓は↑見↑↓み↓つかるもの。
sdata.e: Where there's a will, there's a way.

sdata.j: ↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓が↑乱気流↑↓らんきりゅう↓に↑近付↑↓ちかづ↓いていたため↑操縦↑↓そうじゅう↓↑士↑↓し↓は↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓にシートベルトを↑締↑↓し↓めるよう↑呼↑↓よ↓びかけた。
sdata.e: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓い↓っています。
sdata.e: I like my job very much.

sdata.j: この↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓には↑不思議↑↓ふしぎ↓な↑雰囲気↑↓ふんいき↓がある。
sdata.e: This place has a mysterious atmosphere.

sdata.j: もし↑電気↑↓でんき↓がないと、↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑暮↑↓く↓らしがどのようなものになるか↑想像↑↓そうぞう↓できますか。
sdata.e: Can you imagine what our lives would be like without electricity?

sdata.j: ↑健康↑↓けんこう↓には↑十分↑↓じゅうぶん↓↑気↑↓き↓をつけてください。
sdata.e: Take good care of yourself.

sdata.j: この↑映画↑↓えいが↓は↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: I liked this film.

sdata.j: ↑気↑↓き↓にしていないよ。
sdata.e: I don't care.

sdata.j: どうぞ↑気楽↑↓きらく↓にして↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Make yourself at home.

sdata.j: ↑都会↑↓とかい↓では↑気付↑↓きづ↓かれず↑通↑↓とお↓り↑過↑↓す↓ぎることもあるだろうが、↑村↑↓むら↓の↑中↑↓なか↓ではそうはいかない。
sdata.e: In a town you may pass unnoticed, whereas in a village it's impossible.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑病気↑↓びょうき↓のお↑母↑↓かあ↓さんの↑面倒↑↓めんどう↓をもっと↑見↑↓み↓るべきだ。
sdata.e: You should take care of your sick mother.
